Reviews.Title: Should have checked reviews first!
Reviews.Author: The Reader "jnjm18"
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this and am very happy with picture quality....we have it hooked up to basic cable outlet.  BUT the audio is so bad we are going to return it.  We do not want to add speakers as the purchase was for a kitchen counter and to save space.  Too bad, we liked everything about this tv except the sound

Reviews.Title: Great TV/Monitor - Need to improve speakers
Reviews.Author: Scott Miles
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use in my study at home.  I wanted something low profile that could serve as both a large pc monitor and also that I could watch TV on.  This unit has been perfect!  In addition to filling my original requirements, I've also joined the High-def world after installing a HD DVR from my cable provider.  The picture quality is fantastic.The only downside to this unit is the poor sound of the speakers.  Fortunately, I had an old stereo receiver and speakers in my garage to hook up to.So, if you have a way to improve the sound, I highly recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor with crisp picture
Reviews.Author: Graphixman
Reviews.Content: I agree with everyone else who has chipped in and stated that the sound quality is sadly lacking. However after doing a lot of research and store visits looking at similar televisions, I thought this was a great deal and bought one. The price was the best so far especially taking into consideration features, and hookups that are available. It was purchased on sale at Best Buy for $299.  I bought this for a small extra bedroom, that I use also for my computer. The size was perfect, and can be wall mounted to save even more room. The screen is crisp, and bright, with a lot of adjustments you can make to suit your tastes. In order to make up for the poor sound quality, I have a decent pair of computer speakers with a subwoofer that hook directly into the back of the TV in an external jack. ( Like I believe they designed it for )  I gave it 4 stars directly for the poor sound, but the other stars are solid for the picture quality.********** Update *********** 12/19/2006Important update,  Ok a day and a half after getting this TV, I had to return it as it all of a sudden developed a "White screen of Death" This item worked flawlessly and then "POOF" stopped. All that existed was a white screen, no snow, not black, just white and blank. I took it back, and exchanged it for another, which has surpassed the day and a half test :-) and so far so good works as it should.

Reviews.Title: Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: SunnySD
Reviews.Content: These reviews saved me a lot of trouble.  My housemate bought this TV last week.  She thought maybe the sound was so bad because the feed was coming  from the cable instead of through the digital box, as my TV does.  She had asked me to try connecting hers to the digital box to see if that would improve the sound.  Instead I checked here first.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Picture - BAD Audio
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Nicolaides
Reviews.Content: I concur with the previous reviwer.  I just got one today and I was very impressed with the video image from both my computer and DirecTV receiver.  However, the autio was bad.  So bad I thought something was wrong.  I called the seller and they said yes, it is bad.  Evidently most people use external speakers, which is what I'm now doing.rating:  5 for video, 1 for audio

Reviews.Title: Unacceptable audio, have to return it
Reviews.Author: S. Robertson "Sandal in MD"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this television, I never splurge on myself.  I  hooked it up with no problem, and got a great picture.  BUT...before reading the reviews I thought the speakers had to be defective, the audio is awful. I will be returning it today, the speakers sound like tin cans and I'll never get used to them.  The television sits on a dresser in my bedrooom, so there's no room to hook up computer speakers.

Reviews.Title: You will have to buy separate speakers...
Reviews.Author: Brazen Bunnies "Brazen Bunnies"
Reviews.Content: The sound is terrible.  But the picture is good and the price was right.If you do not plan to use separate speakers, do not buy this item.  The sound is THAT bad.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: F. Kossa "Imnotcheapimthrifty"
Reviews.Content: Did a lot of comparisons and found this to be the best way to go for a spare set or a first set on a budget. Nice intro set found at a good price on Amazon sold by J&R; Music (very good seller and values as well)All in all picture size etc is great for the $. If you are a freak about this stuff then you may disagree but the average Joe will be pleased. I don't write reviews ever...this one was worth it. Good Deal here !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LCD TV for a budget price
Reviews.Author: C. Sage "FilmSage"
Reviews.Content: I use this TV to play my xbox360 and PS3 consoles on and I have no complaints.  Many have complained about the speaker's audio quality, I do not disagree.  However my solution was to plug in $15 speakers into the Audio out- problem solved.  The image is crisp and well contrasted.  The VGA allows the 360 to attain crisper 1080i than component.  The DVI allows the TV to double as a sharp monitor.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Reviews.Title: Product was defective
Reviews.Author: Sy5temgro0ve
Reviews.Content: Tiger Direct was great, due to there quick shipping and excellent customer service; but the product was defective. LCD could only cycle through the monitor inputs and not the video or cable inputs. So basically instead of being a TV it was just an overpriced monitor. I sent it back to TigerDirect and they said they would give me a complete refund. Picture quality was good for the price and the size was great for my needs. I wish it actually worked as advertised. I will never order electronics online over $200 ever again. What a dissapointment especially having to wait two weeks to receive it overseas, finding out that its defective, and then wait another 2 - 4 weeks to get my refund. Also the couple of hours I spent troubleshooting thinking it was user error was a serious headache. I would definitely order from TigerDirect again since these things do happen. I dont know if I would buy a Westinghouse ever again. I hoped this helped someone.

Reviews.Title: Sound - what sound?
Reviews.Author: Rajean P. Moone "Abskgkdde"
Reviews.Content: I have a Westinghouse 42 in my living room and bought this one for my home gym...the speakers are horrible. The picture quality is good. You're going to have to buy speakers.The TV was a nice one - I had it for awhile and moved it into my bedroom in a new home. Speakers obviously change the entire dynamic of this TV. I gave it to my parents who needed a computer monitor for theirs that died.I'd probably buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Chalked full of features, but fell short on audio capability.
Reviews.Author: H. Gil "WestCoastBabe"
Reviews.Content: This TV/Monitor is great for the price. I bought this for about $179 from TigersDirect (after various discounts). I use this as a TV and the picture quality is spectacular, A+.However, the audio quality really blows, really.... it really sucks. I thought I could deal with it, but it is just unacceptable. As such, I went to RadioShack and got a 2.1 speaker system and now it works great.The monitor's sleek black finish is appealing, stylish and will accent any room.In sum, this TV's picture quality makes all the difference despite the short comings of the audio capability. If you can get one of these for a good price and don't mind external speakers, then I would certainly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture but lousy sound
Reviews.Author: Junior Geek "Junior Geek"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this T.V. Black Friday through Best Buy's web site for $[...] after rebate.  Great picture but REALLY LOUSY SOUND.  I then purchased Altec Lansic computer speakers, with subwoofer, for $[...] on line and now I couldn't be happier!  Great picture and now, great sound!Another problem - This T.V. does not have a universal remote code!  Wierd.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer Monitor with Picture in Picture feature
Reviews.Author: L. Quiroz "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor, i do agree with the others that the speakers are poor.  As a stand alone TV, i don't think it will be that good... but if you use it as a computer monitor/tv and you already have a speaker system on your computer, then these just plug in on the back of the monitor and will work for both, your computer and TV signal... you can have the choice of PIP feature, and choose which audio to use, the computers or the TV signal... i personally loved, it i went out and purchased another one... the clarity is nice... plus it has several audio video ports, something you wont find on most 19 inch wide monitors... i give it 4 out of 5, for the simple reason of the speakers... beyond that, it is worth it...

Reviews.Title: Yes, the audio really is that bad
Reviews.Author: Julie Miller
Reviews.Content: I just set this TV up last night, and while the picture is great, the speakers are really horrible. If you see the TV at a good price, buy it, but be aware that you'll have to shell out extra for external speakers.

Reviews.Title: The speaker is unacceptable
Reviews.Author: Yan Guo
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is quite good, however, the speaker completely sucks. The 8bucks discount speakers I bought at fleemarket sound much better than this.  As a TV this is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Channel up/down doesn't work
Reviews.Author: ericatdallas "ericatdallas"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is fine and the audio quality isn't too bad either. However, the remote or receiver is poor. I have point the remote several times before it responds and the channel up/down doesn't work very well.I ended up buying a universal remote hoping this would help. All the functions work with the Westinghouse and Sony codes EXCEPT the channel up/down.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Niranjankumar Desai
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV during early 2007. So far it is working good. Speaker volume is poor, but for the size of TV it is OK. Since the DTV era begin, it needs converter box? But seems speaker volume slightly increased, due to converter box attached. Why they manufactured this TV analogue only?

Reviews.Title: Good picture, slow channel switch terrible audio
Reviews.Author: Kevin Arruda
Reviews.Content: I have this TV mounted on the wall at the end of my bed.  It honestly has a great picture, but the audio is so unbearably bad that I don't even know why they bothered the put speakers on it.  However it does have a headphone jack audio-out so you can easily hook up a small set up speakers.  I used a 3 piece cambridge soundworks system and it works just great.  If you can get a deal on this TV, just group in a pair of speakers with it.  External speakers are almost always better than TV speakers anyways.Another complaint I had is that the remote doesn't seem to work well.  The power button eventually stopped working.  I took it apart and there was nothing spilled on it or obstructing the contacts - it is just poor quality I guess.The TV channels also seem to switch annoyingly slow when using the built in tuner.  You can obviously get around this by using a digital cable box.I would only reccomend this TV if you get an EXCEPTIONAL deal on it.  If you are going to pay full price, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: D. Rulka "philly freak"
Reviews.Content: I HOOKED IT UP WITH HD CABLE AND HOOKED UP SURROUND SOUND I ALREADY HAD AND IT WORKS BEAUTIFULLY. I LOVE THIS TV AND SO HAPPY WITH IT. OTHER THAN SPEAKERS THAT WESTINGHOUSE DROPPED THE BALL ON. IT'S A GREAT TV. 4 1/2 STARS.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for the $$, horrible sound...
Reviews.Author: M. David Bell
Reviews.Content: I agree with everyone else, the sound really is horrible, but thats what you get out of these small LCD's. However, the screen was for our 5yr old son in his bedroom and the quality is more than enough for a kid his age. We will probably get the 27" for our room, and upgrade the speakers. :)

Reviews.Title: Expensive piece of Computer Monitor!!!
Reviews.Author: Rajesh Ramachandran
Reviews.Content: I completely agree with the reviewer "Sy5temgro0ve". After 3 months of excellent usage, the LCD could only cycle through the monitor inputs and not the video or cable inputs.The worst part it since it was multiple voltage compatible i sent it to my country (220 watts) and after 3 days of operation it lost the TV/Video capability. Though i got it from bestbuy, i am stuck with it cause i need to bring it back to get it replaced. Not worth the pain. Now it is sitting in my home as a overpriced computer monitor.But overall it is a good piece of technology with great feature, wish it works though.
